title: Be king or queen of your very own castle for a night
text:
Be king or queen of your very own castle for a night Be king or queen of your very own castle for a night Details   16:15 ‘Eskeclusive’ use of the Donegal’s luxurious Lough Eske Castle available from €9,950 For those who have always dreamt of being King or Queen of the castle and hosting a royal event, Lough Eske Castle’s exclusive use offer is perfect. From €9,950 per night guests can welcome friends, family and colleagues to this spectacular setting, knowing they’ll have the ultimate privacy, elegance and exclusivity they’ve always dreamed of. 
The hotel’s relaxed grandeur and exceptional service will ensure that each guest feels like royalty; and with 96 en-suite bedrooms, exclusive use of the meeting rooms, pool and fitness centre, Lough Eske Castle is perfect for weddings, corporate events, conferences and private parties alike. The dedicated events team work with each individual client to tailor a package around these fantastic facilities, creating unique and spectacular exclusive events. The castle’s Cedars Grill can provide guests with a range of culinary dishes that really make the most of the region’s high-quality fresh produce. For those needing a little pick-me-up the next day, the restaurant’s superb buffet-style and full Irish breakfasts are guaranteed to leave them feeling satisfied and refreshed. Guests looking for an unusual gastronomy treat can head to the Castle’s Smoke House with the executive head chef to smoke their very own fish, meat and cheese. The Oak and Gallery Bars provide the perfect atmosphere for an evening drink or informal meeting and the castle’s well-stocked wine cellar and selection of over 90 whiskies is sure to appease everyone’s palette. The historic castle is beautifully set in 43 acres of woodland on the shores of Lough Eske, just outside Donegal Town. Guests wanting to explore the great outdoors will find the hotel is perfectly located in the foothills of the Blue Stack Mountains and on the edge of the Wild Atlantic Way – a 2,500 kilometre stretch of one of Ireland’s most spectacular coastal trails. There’s no need to worry about guests being entertained either; relaxation can be found at the on-site spa which features a thermal suite and offers a range of Aromatherapy Associates treatments, including massages, facials, body care and pregnancy treatments. Combine the relaxation offering, spectacular setting and easily accessible activities such as horse riding, golfing, hiking, biking and water sports and guests can be sure their event is all anyone can talk about. Offer valid for events between November 2015 and March 2016, subject to availability. Dinner and breakfast are not included in package price. Related articles
